get.summary: Logs returns logs of the PMM-Server.

schema.description: ErrorResponse is a message returned on HTTP error.

post.summary: AWSInstanceCheck checks AWS EC2 instance ID.
PlatformSignIn links that PMM instance to Percona Platform user.
PlatformSignOut logouts this PMM instance from Percona Platform account.
PlatformSignUp creates a new Percona Platform user.

data_retention.description: A number of full days for Prometheus and QAN data retention. Should have a suffix in JSON: 2592000s, 43200m, 720h.

email_alerting_settings.description: EmailAlertingSettings represents email (SMTP) configuration for Integrated Alerting.

hello.description: Hostname to identify to the SMTP server.

username.description: Auth using CRAM-MD5, LOGIN and PLAIN.

metrics_resolutions.description: MetricsResolutions represents Prometheus exporters metrics resolutions.

hr.description: High resolution. Should have a suffix in JSON: 1s, 1m, 1h.

lr.description: Low resolution. Should have a suffix in JSON: 1s, 1m, 1h.

mr.description: Medium resolution. Should have a suffix in JSON: 1s, 1m, 1h.

remove_alert_manager_rules.description: Remove custom alerting or recording rules.

remove_email_alerting_settings.description: If true, removes Integrated Alerting email (SMTP) settings.

remove_slack_alerting_settings.description: If true, removes Integrated Alerting Slack settings.

slack_alerting_settings.description: SlackAlertingSettings represents Slack configuration for Integrated Alerting.

stt_check_intervals.description: STTCheckIntervals represents intervals between STT checks.

alerting_enabled.description: True if Integrated Alerting is enabled.

email_alerting_settings.description: EmailAlertingSettings represents email (SMTP) configuration for Integrated Alerting.

hello.description: Hostname to identify to the SMTP server.

username.description: Auth using CRAM-MD5, LOGIN and PLAIN.

metrics_resolutions.description: MetricsResolutions represents Prometheus exporters metrics resolutions.

hr.description: High resolution. Should have a suffix in JSON: 1s, 1m, 1h.

lr.description: Low resolution. Should have a suffix in JSON: 1s, 1m, 1h.

mr.description: Medium resolution. Should have a suffix in JSON: 1s, 1m, 1h.

platform_email.description: Percona Platform user's email, if this PMM instance is linked to the Platform.

slack_alerting_settings.description: SlackAlertingSettings represents Slack configuration for Integrated Alerting.

stt_check_intervals.description: STTCheckIntervals represents intervals between STT checks.

stt_enabled.description: True if Security Threat Tool is enabled.

post.summary: GetSettings returns current PMM Server settings.

alerting_enabled.description: True if Integrated Alerting is enabled.

email_alerting_settings.description: EmailAlertingSettings represents email (SMTP) configuration for Integrated Alerting.

hello.description: Hostname to identify to the SMTP server.

username.description: Auth using CRAM-MD5, LOGIN and PLAIN.

metrics_resolutions.description: MetricsResolutions represents Prometheus exporters metrics resolutions.

hr.description: High resolution. Should have a suffix in JSON: 1s, 1m, 1h.

lr.description: Low resolution. Should have a suffix in JSON: 1s, 1m, 1h.

mr.description: Medium resolution. Should have a suffix in JSON: 1s, 1m, 1h.

platform_email.description: Percona Platform user's email, if this PMM instance is linked to the Platform.

slack_alerting_settings.description: SlackAlertingSettings represents Slack configuration for Integrated Alerting.

stt_check_intervals.description: STTCheckIntervals represents intervals between STT checks.

post.summary: CheckUpdates checks PMM Server updates availability.

force.description: If false, cached information may be returned.

installed.description: VersionInfo describes component version, or PMM Server as a whole.

latest.description: VersionInfo describes component version, or PMM Server as a whole.

latest_news_url.description: Latest available PMM Server release announcement URL.

update_available.description: True if there is a PMM Server update available.

auth_token.description: Authentication token for getting update statuses.

post.summary: UpdateStatus returns PMM Server update status.

log_offset.description: Progress log offset for the next request.

get.summary:
Readiness returns an error when some PMM Server component is not ready yet or is being restarted.
It can be used as for Docker health check or Kubernetes readiness probe.

parameters.description: Dummy parameter for internal testing. Do not use.
parameters.name: dummy

distribution_method.description: DistributionMethod defines PMM Server distribution method: Docker image, OVF/OVA, or AMI.

managed.description: VersionInfo describes component version, or PMM Server as a whole.

server.description: VersionInfo describes component version, or PMM Server as a whole.
